mapper.select: select * from class where prof_no = ( select member_no from member where m_type = 'P' and member_id = #{memberId} ) and class_status = 'Y'
select count(*) from class where prof_no = ( select member_no from member where m_type = 'P' and member_id = #{memberId} )

select c.class_num , c.enroll_date , c.class_grade , c.class_semester , c.class_name , t.class_typename , c.class_no from class c join class_type t on c.class_type = t.class_type where c.class_status = 'Y' and c.prof_no =( select member_no from member where m_type = 'P' and member_id = #{memberId} )
select * from class c join class_type t on c.class_type = t.class_type where c.class_no = #{classNo}
mapper.update: update class set class_status = 'N' where class_no = #{classNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from class_notice where cn_status = 'Y' and ref_class_no = #{classNum}

select ref_class_no , class_notice_no , cn_title , cn_date , cn_count , cn_writer , class_name from class_notice cn join class c on c.class_num = cn.ref_class_no join course co on co.class_num = cn.ref_class_no where cn_status ='Y' and ref_class_no = #{classNum} and course_status = 'Y' order by cn_date desc
mapper.update: update class_notice set cn_count = cn_count + 1 where class_notice_no = #{cno} and cn_status = 'Y'
mapper.select: select class_notice_no , cn_title , cn_content , cn_date , cn_count , member_name , cn_change_name , cn_origin_name , class_name from class_notice join member on(cn_writer = member_no) join class on(ref_class_no = class_num) where class_notice_no = #{cno} and cn_status = 'Y'

select class_no , class_num , member_name , class_score , class_time , class_room , class_name , origin_name , change_name from class join member on(prof_no = member_no) where class_num = #{classNum} and enroll_date = 2024
select count(*) from class_board where cb_status = 'Y' and ref_class_no = #{classNum}

select class_board_no , cb_title , cb_date , student_name , cb_count , class_name from class_board join student on (cb_writer = student_no) join class on (class_num = ref_class_no) where cb_status = 'Y' and ref_class_no = #{classNum} order by class_board_no desc
update class_board set cb_count = cb_count + 1 where class_board_no = #{bno} and cb_status = 'Y'

select class_board_no , student_name , cb_title , cb_content , cb_origin_name , cb_change_name , cb_count , cb_date from class_board join student on (student_no = cb_writer) where cb_status = 'Y' and class_board_no = #{bno}
